prompts: Create a Pokemon that can produce sound waves with vibrant colors and distinct features.
I want a character design for a Normal-type Pokemon that excels in loud vocalizations.
Generate a creature with a unique body shape and colors that stand out in a forest setting.
Make a Pokemon that embodies the essence of sound and has a fun, expressive personality.
Imagine a Pokemon that thrives in urban areas and has a playful, energetic demeanor.
Design a creature that can amplify sound and has an interesting mix of blue and yellow colors.
Show me a Pokemon with a unique evolution that emphasizes its vocal abilities and visual traits.

distinctive_features: Large mouth with a wide open expression
Round body with a chubby appearance
